title: Bella Thorne directs film for Pornhub's Visionaries Director's Series
text: Bella Thorne has made a surprising directorial debut – an adult movie for Pornhub. The former Disney star’s film, titled “Her & Him,” "depicts an edgy twenty-something guy who stumbles upon a surprise text in his girlfriend's phone, interrupting their morning routine and spinning everything into an out-of-control sexually charged encounter," according to the press release. Pornhub vice president Corey Price described it as a “modernistic, sexually explicit” Romeo and Juliet-inspired story of two lovers, which was commissioned as part of its Visionaries Director’s Series.
